Reviews.Title: Phantom 1, not Phantom 2
Reviews.Author: C. Fink
Reviews.Content: I have not purchased this specific model from Amazon, but I did purchase the actual Phantom 2 off Amazon for $710.Just a word of warning for those that may not be as educated on these.  This is NOT the most recent version of the DJI Phantom.  This is the Phantom 1, with around 18 minutes run time.  If you are looking for the DJI Phantom 2, with the new Intelligent Battery System that carries a 25 minute run time and is compatible with the Zenmuse H3-2D gimbal, this is NOT the Phantom that you want.  Also, the propellers that come with this kit are not going to be the self-tightening propellers, as those are only compatible with the Phantom 2 (Vision & Non-Vision).Just trying to help those that may get into something they don't want.

Reviews.Title: fun ship to fly
Reviews.Author: Tim H.
Reviews.Content: I bought the Phantom and after the first accidentally starting the motors-it makes a darn good lawnmower! The prop guards were immediately mounted. It is so stable on gps mode that I have not flown it in any other mode Haven't attempted the go home feature. The price was good under $500. and is well worth the money invested. It also handles winds around 15mph. I live along a major hiway miles from any town and will hover this craft near the road and it does turn heads. Be sure to  watch the videos first and make sure you understand them. The lawn found out the hard way. the video from the gopro cam are good and no jello effect.

Reviews.Title: DJI PHANTOM V1.1.1
Reviews.Author: Brooke Harrison
Reviews.Content: When I first saw the phantom, the completely encased frame style (as opposed to the open truss style arms, attatched to a central platform) sorta put me off. Seeing it just gave me a feeling of it being heavy, having more drag, and being less responsive, more of a toy than a machine with real functional uses. I couldn't have been more wrong! The advanced electronics in this sucker make it simple to fly and control, like the huge ones selling for ten times more. Its perfect for a go pro and after more than twenty flights, I can tell you that the big boys claim a 12-15 minute flight time with their Hexas and Octos, and thats exactly what I get with the Phantom. I have also been impressed with the durability as well, having flow it into trees many times now, and even a few ground impacts, and it has suffered no serious damage. I felt it was a good idea to use the blade guards for safety, but its my thinking that having those guards on there has saved it from serious damage, because I have broken some of them in my crashes, and I feel they took the main impact of the crash and the craft itself was unharmed. This is one item that really is as cool as it looks !!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Austin Andersen
Reviews.Content: Some reviews stated they didnt get antivibration addon so I checked with seller before I bought and IT IS INCLUDED. I received with the addon as well. This is an excellent package and would highly recommend it at price or $499 which I paid. The guards are very handy but do add alot of girth to drone and makes it impossible to get a case for it. The antivibration is a must have (however I quickly realized I wanted a gimbal which I got on amazon for $100). The extra propellers are nice as I wasnt paying attention to battery and drone fell on 3rd flight. You will absolutely need extra batteries for this.As far as the DJI Phantom, can't be beat with simplicity. You must watch youtube videos to learn all the basics before flying, but it really is simple and easy to learn when you experiment on your own. I used my gopro 3+ silver and the videos are amazing.Couple test flights on youtube[...][...]DON'T HESITATE, BUY THIS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!BEST BUY ON AMAZON EVER

Reviews.Title: Complete Quad-copter package.
Reviews.Author: Capt. Mike Vit
Reviews.Content: With the help of the average 18 year old kid ( due to the fact that Kids are technologically adapt right out of the box) this complete package can be set up and flying in no time.  There are a few updates and what not to you will have to download to calibrate the gps and set up the compass properly but once that is complete its nothing but fun.  I cannot describe what what fun I'm having with my Go pro camera attached to the bottom.  go to youtube and search videos for this product and you will see how much fun it can really be.

Reviews.Title: Great toy
Reviews.Author: Daniel L Tice
Reviews.Content: It is a decent price I got it quick and I have a lot of fun with my boys thank you

Reviews.Title: DJI Phantom Aerial UAV Drone Quadcopter
Reviews.Author: Karen Callahan
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas present.... and it was a hit!!!  Meets all the expectations.... very easy to control, but challenging.... great gift...

Reviews.Title: Awesome views!
Reviews.Author: MG
Reviews.Content: Using this with the GoPro is amazing.  It's going to come with us on vacation for sure!  You see things around you that you never knew were there.

Reviews.Title: The Phantom takes video from above
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: This phantom rocks so easy to fly.What I recommend is go to YouTube type in DJI Phantom chapter 1 watch all the following videos also. When you first use the phantom take your time let it run through the start up sequence and remember to calibrate your compass . I first flew mine with out the gopro to get use to the controls witch response very smooth. The gopro video it takes from the birds eye view is assume . You might want to invest in extra battery's run time is about 7to 8 minutes with the stock battery . This package with the phantom is a great way to start out . If your on the fence about getting one, just get it you will want to fly it every chance you get .

Reviews.Title: terrible product and customer service
Reviews.Author: Henry delahoz
Reviews.Content: i bought this as a gift for my 21 yr old son, it worked for 1 day then started having issues. we sent it in to DJI to have them look at it, after 2 weeks they hadnt even looked at it and trying to talk to them requires 1 hr waiting on the phone to even talk to them. I'm trying to get a refund as i have no drone and no money returned for a faulty product.

Reviews.Title: Good price, fast delivery, great product!
Reviews.Author: M. Clements
Reviews.Content: Exactly what was described, got here fast, extras included with a good price. I've had a bast with the Phantom, easy to fly.

Reviews.Title: DJI
Reviews.Author: Jim C So Cal "Go Kings"
Reviews.Content: An incredible drone. Its fun and easy to fly with or without the GoPro attached.  It works exactly as described.

Reviews.Title: Dji phantom is a great flying machine
Reviews.Author: Ken La Mascus
Reviews.Content: It has more than met my expectations and really enjoying it.Also the ordering and shipping was great I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a quadcoper.

Reviews.Title: Go Pro Drones
Reviews.Author: Peggy A.
Reviews.Content: Awesome gift for my son and husband, they have been using Go Pros for all their sporting events, BMX racing, ATV, Skiing, Snowboarding and now they get aerial views which we watch on our TV. Husband Loved it so much he bought the DSLR model also!

Reviews.Title: It's all good except one thing.
Reviews.Author: Adam Gordon
Reviews.Content: This kit is great. A great value, however I did not receive the vibration anti jello plates with mine.. Which is sort of why I went with this kit.. I didn't get them so I ordered them elsewhere. Which is why I'm docking it 3 points. The rest is good. The prop guards are highly recommended for newbies. Saved my blades a handful if times. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Must Get!
Reviews.Author: Skip Mulvey
Reviews.Content: I have owned and still own many many rc products from street to dirt to flying, water. This little quad copter is the best product for the money yet. A must purchase if you ar ein the market for this type of rc. Also a very stable video platform.

Reviews.Title: It's a MUST HAVE item for your aerial pictures everywhere
Reviews.Author: HOMARO LIMA
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, really does everything it says and if you have enought time to read all the instructions then you will really get the benefit of your purchase! What is useless at the end was the propeller protection, it's really unnecessary...

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Herman Dill
Reviews.Content: This copter was easy to install. In one hour I was on my first test flight. The longest part is charging the battery.

Reviews.Title: this product got one star for a reason
Reviews.Author: rog
Reviews.Content: the dji phantom might have got five stars if everything came with the order. it was missing the anti vibration mount in my package.otherwise it flies great as advertised. I love this quad copter and love to fly it. when you order something you should get what you have paid for.
